dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 1679 IH: To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to clarify the application of that Act to American Samoa.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Faleomavaega introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Expedited Funds Availability Act to clarify the application of that Act to American Samoa.

section.header: Application of the Expedited Funds Availability Act
section.text: The Expedited Funds Availability Act (12 U.S.C. 4001 et seq.) is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 602(23) (12 U.S.C. 4001(23)) by inserting American Samoa, after Puerto Rico,; and
by adding at the end of section 603(d) (12 U.S.C. 4002(d)) the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Extension for certain deposits in American Samoa
paragraph.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any time period established under subsection (b), (c), or (e) shall be extended by 2 business days in the case of any deposit which is both—

subparagraph.text: deposited by a check drawn on an originating depository institution which is not located in the same State as the receiving depository institution.
